title: Divine Diamond Vanki - Vaajra Kadiyam
features: Contemporary Vanki (armlet/bangle) design featuring two parallel rows of floral clusters, each meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds. The open-shank design allows for comfortable wear, reflecting a modern sensibility while hinting at traditional Vanki styles. Features a high Hyderabadi polish for enhanced luster and durability.
occasions: or a sophisticated addition to any formal attire. Suitable for Seemantham ceremonies where a touch of modern elegance is desired.
description: This stunning diamond Vanki is a true statement piece, blending the timeless allure of diamonds with contemporary design. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. A modern interpretation of a traditional South Indian armlet, symbolizing strength and prosperity. The open-shank design offers flexibility and comfort.
